programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E02, This is the story of the hunt for one of the most notorious serial killers in American history--the BTK killer. After committing at least seven brutal murders he vanished for over 25 years before sending clues of his crimes to the media in 2004.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E18, After 19 years, Kansas detectives reopen the case of a banker found beaten to death in his bed--and the chief suspect is his cheating wife. And a man with a guilty conscience helps Arkansas police to crack a cold case of murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E07, We follow Det. Vince Velazquez of Atlanta and Capt. Russell Popham of East Point, Ga., as they work to solve the 1995 rape and murder of 14-year-old Nacole Smith, one of Atlanta's most notorious unsolved crimes.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E20, A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E04, Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: A Killer Slips Away
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E10, The loving aunt of a close-knit family is stabbed to death in her home. It takes two decades for detectives to discover that a key witness was an imposter--and caused the case to go cold.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E18, A forensic scientist's painstaking examination of a rape kit helps solve the 15-year-old murder of a teenage girl. And when California investigators probe the murder of a 71-year-old man, they get help from the top suspect's former therapist.

programme.title: The Lost Patient
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E25, In 1979 Janie Landers disappears from a home for the impaired--the latest consequence of the facility's history of neglect. When Janie's body is found, there are many suspects but it is years before the killer is found.

programme.title: Circle of Friends
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E07, When 18-year-old Shannon Siders' body is found in the woods, everyone in the small town of Newaygo, Michigan, becomes a suspect--but no one is convicted of the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2005, A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E01, In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E03, While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Ashes
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E20, When a deadly house fire claims the life of a family in rural Oklahoma, investigators suspect foul play and it sends a mother on a decades-long crusade to find out what happened to her missing teenage daughter and best friend.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E18, New DNA technology and the national DNA databank help police hunt down a rapist-killer 11 years after he committed his crimes, and a detective's painstaking recreation of a woman's shooting death proves it wasn't an accident.

programme.title: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E01, A kidnapper grabs 8-year-old Chad Choice from his home in Texas, then torments his parents with two ransom demands. The case goes cold until the parents receive a chilling package in the mail that contains a letter--and a skull.

programme.title: Danger Death Ray
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Danger Death Ray, S06E20, A slick secret agent investigating an evil organization that stole a top secret death ray.

MST3K: Bloodlust, 19940903000000 +0000, Mike and the Bots watch a cheap ripoff of The Most Dangerous Game, where a rich game hunter tricks a group of stranded college kids into becoming prey for his latest blood sport.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Junior Rodeo Daredevils
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E16, A prank gone wrong leads to children taking on a dangerous new sport.

programme.title: The Slime People
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Slime People, S01E09, The crew puts Commando Cody on trial for crimes against reality after watching the sixth episode of Radar Men while slime monsters invade Los Angeles in The Slime People.
MST3K: Pod People, 19910615000000 +0000, A child adopts a large egg which hatches into a mischievous alien, while a group of pop musicians on a wilderness vacation runs into trouble.

programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E22, It's Heaven vs. Hell in this short. Plus: bread?

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 3: Crashing Towers
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E12, The final chapter of the 1939 serial starring Bela Lugosi.

MST3K: Robot Wars, 20220507000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch ROBOT WARS (1993). A new SOL is introduced and a new Gizmonic tech arrives.

MST3K: Robot Holocaust, 19900113000000 +0000, After the ninth chapter of Radar Men From The Moon (1952) ends in technical difficulties, Joel and the bots must endure Robot Holocaust (1986). They pretend to be characters from the movie, but Tom Servo is the only one who is into it.

MST3K: Robot Monster: MST3K: Robot Monster, 19891223080000 +0000, The guys watch a post-apocalyptic film about aliens and robots, riff on two more installments of "Radar Men from the Moon", and try to understand surrealism.

programme.title: We're Not Losing a Son
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E04, Hallmark Original Series. Abby settles in and starts her job at her firm's Baltimore office.

programme.title: We're Gaining a Daughter
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E05, Hallmark Original Series. As Kevin remains missing, the O'Brien family nervously wait for news.

programme.title: Georgia on My Mind
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E06, Hallmark Original Series. Kevin's fiance, Georgia, arrives in Chesapeake Shores.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E07, Hallmark Original Series. Abby finds out the truth about the fraud investigation from an unlikely source.

Loving Leah, 20090125000000 +0000, When Leah's husband Benjamin dies suddenly, Benjamin's brother Jake is stunned to learn he is expected to marry Leah to carry on the name. Jake suggests to Leah that they get married and maintain a secretly platonic relationship.
My Sister's Keeper, 20020127000000 +0000, Two sisters embark on a journey of discovery and reconciliation in this poignant real-life story based on the memoirs of Margaret Moorman.

A Tale of Two Cities, 19801202000000 +0000, Based on Charles Dickens' classic, two identical men (both played by Chris Sarandon) - one from England and one from France - fall for the same woman during the height of the French Revolution.

Decoration Day, 19901202000000 +0000, A grumpy man must rejoin his community when his godchild gets in trouble and a childhood friend refuses to accept a Congressional Medal of Honor for bravery in World War II. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

Duke, 20120428000000 +0000, When war veteran Terry Pulaski's dog Duke becomes ill, Terry seeks anonymous help from a nearby veterinary clinic. It soon becomes a community's quest to reunite Terry with his beloved dog. Stars Steven Weber.

Recipe for Love, 20141011000000 +0000, A culinary-school hopeful gets assigned to ghostwrite a cookbook for a popular celebrity chef, but the two of them clash over contradictory cooking styles. However, their shared love of cooking sparks a connection.

programme.title: Beachhead
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E06, The brilliant astrophysicist and former member Samantha Carter returns to SG-1 to join the team on a mission to free a distant planet called Kallana from the Ori's control. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Ex Deus Machina
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E07, The SG-1 team must intervene when a major ongoing conflict between the strident Jaffa Gerak and their former enemy Ba'al puts the entire United States at risk of destruction. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Babylon
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E08, Lieutenant Colonel Cameron Mitchell disappears while trying to contact the Sodan, a band of legendary Jaffa warriors who escaped Goa'uld rule and colonized their own planet. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Prototype
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E09, Hank Landry (Beau Bridges) and his government overseers disagree over what to do about what they found in a lab: Anubis' dangerous, genetically engineered Goa'uld creation. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: The Fourth Horseman (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E10, As SG-1 tries to stop the spread of a deadly virus that was caused by the devious Ori, the Jaffa Gerak works on converting the rest of the Jaffa to worshippers of the Ori. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: The Fourth Horseman (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E11, As the Jaffa Gerak amasses forces to rise against them, the Stargate team races to find an antidote to stop a deadly Ori plague from becoming a devastating global pandemic. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Collateral Damage
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E12, Complications arise when lieutenant Colonel Cameron Mitchell becomes the victim of powerful and dangerous technology that allows individuals to share memories with each other. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: The Lost Tribe
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E11, Jackson and McKay have reactivated the Attero device, an ancient machine designed to annihilate the Wraith. In doing so, they discover the reason the device was ultimately abandoned… Meanwhile, Todd continues to hold the Daedalus crew captive.

programme.title: Outsiders
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E12, Col. Sheppard and his team locate Dr. Carson Beckett on an alien planet where he is treating a small group of survivors of the Hoffan plague. But that same evening, a party of Wraith warriors arrives, threatening total annihilation.

programme.title: Inquisition
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E13, A newly formed galactic coalition extends an invitation to Lt. Col. John Sheppard and his team to represent Atlantis at their next meeting. But on arrival, the team is immediately detained and must stand trial for crimes against humanity.

programme.title: The Prodigal
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E14, Atlantis is suddenly plunged into darkness, with only the top tier of the central tower unaffected. As Sheppard and McKay attempt to get to the top level, they discover that a force field has been established to prevent them from gaining access.

programme.title: Remnants
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E15, While Richard Woolsey (Robert Picardo) struggles to keep his position as the leader of Atlantis, and McKay (David Hewlett) and Zelenka (David Nykl) investigate a mysterious find, Sheppard is captured by an old enemy with plans to invade the city.

programme.title: Brain Storm
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E16, When the Atlantis team is given two weeks of vacation leave, Dr. Rodney McKay reluctantly accepts an invitation by his former rival, Malcolm Tunney, to attend a scientific demonstration that he claims will be the solution to global warming.

programme.title: Infection
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E17, The team prepares for the worst as board a Wraith hive ship over Atlantis. They're surprised to find the Wraith crew in stasis when a malfunction on the hive ship releases the remaining crew… who have been cannibalizing one another for food.

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E18, When Dr. Jennifer Keller is observed behaving very strangely, extensive testing reveals nothing abnormal. But McKay’s investigation leads him to suspect that Dr. Keller and Neela Casol, a notorious criminal, have switched consciousnesses.

programme.title: Hope
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E14, While connected to the stones in an attempt to contact Homeworld Command, Chloe wakes up with Ginn’s consciousness. Eli must find a way to protect Chloe without losing Ginn. Meanwhile, Volker requires a difficult operation to save his life.

programme.title: Seizure
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E15, Homeworld Command tries to convince an ally they suspect might be infiltrated by the Lucian Alliance to let them use their planet to power up and dial Destiny. Meanwhile, Rush is trapped in a simulation created by Amanda Perry.
